catalogue_raissonne: Marks, Genji's World in Japanese Woodblock Prints (2012), no. G478.01-22
creditline: Gift of Anne M. Drolet in memory of her grandfather, Dr. Andrew Longacre
description: soft cardboard cover printed on front and back in color on cream paper with red-headed cranes--some flying, some on ground, with green foliage, blue water and yellow clouds; color images on each side spanning two pages; borders around each image with red, pink and white floral and geometric designs; text primarily in square and rectangular cartouches on each image; bright colors; 26 images
medium: Album of woodblock prints (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Fifty-Four Chapters of Genji (Genji gojūyojō 源氏五十四帖)
title: Twenty-Six Prints from the Series Fifty-Four Chapters of Genji
